description:
Latteusa and his twin Cappuccinousa specialize in making coffee (or barista). He`s good with his hands, and likes drawing Cappuccinos. 
Latte-usa befriends Sophia, but seems to live with one of Sophia`s friends, along with three other bunnies once they are found out. Latte-usa is able to throw his ears in the air, but he only seems to do this when in serious danger.
name: Latte Usa
